lead_paragraph: Embracing a man who once called him a "degenerate idiot," former Gov. George E. Pataki on Monday endorsed Carl P. Paladino, the Republican nominee to be New York's governor.
snippet: Former Gov. George E. Pataki delivered a somewhat tepid endorsement of Carl P. Paladino, the Republican nominee for governor, who once called Mr. Pataki a "degenerate idiot.''

headline.main: Pataki Gives Paladino a Last-Minute Endorsement

abstract: Former Gov. George E. Pataki delivered a somewhat tepid endorsement of Carl P. Paladino, the Republican nominee for governor, who once called Mr. Pataki a "degenerate idiot.''
